blogPost.title: What are the new norms for working remote? Answer by @tsedal, Professor at @HarvardHBS. Author of Remote Work Revolution. https://t.co/J5aX5U7S1M https://t.co/kFtEnJ084N
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: リモートワークの新常識とは？回答者：@tsedal（@HarvardHBS教授）。Remote Work Revolution』の著者。 https://t.co/J5aX5U7S1M https://t.co/kFtEnJ084N
远程工作的新规范是什么？回答者：@tsedal，@HarvardHBS的教授。远程工作革命》的作者。https://t.co/J5aX5U7S1M https://t.co/kFtEnJ084N
遠程工作的新規範是什麼？回答者：@tsedal，@HarvardHBS的教授。遠程工作革命》的作者。https://t.co/J5aX5U7S1M https://t.co/kFtEnJ084N

previous.title: How can we reframe difficult situations to help get us through tough times? Answer by @AneseCavanaugh, author of Contagious You. https://t.co/2AVNOQa8Tn https://t.co/Fix4UnCEwq

localize.full_text: 困難な状況を乗り越えるために、どのようにリフレーミングすればよいのでしょうか？Contagious You』の著者、@AneseCavanaugh氏の回答です。https://t.co/2AVNOQa8Tn https://t.co/Fix4UnCEwq
我们如何重塑困难的局面，以帮助我们度过艰难的时刻？回答者：@AneseCavanaugh, Contagious You的作者。https://t.co/2AVNOQa8Tn https://t.co/Fix4UnCEwq
我們如何重塑困難的局面，以幫助我們度過艱難的時刻？回答者：@AneseCavanaugh, Contagious You的作者。https://t.co/2AVNOQa8Tn https://t.co/Fix4UnCEwq

next.title: How can I save up to be able to afford a down payment on a new home? Answer by Tiffany Aliche (@TheBudgetnista). https://t.co/r5SgPEJmqo https://t.co/6GWB1BRh9T

localize.full_text: 新築住宅の頭金を払えるようになるには、どうやって貯金すればいいですか？Answer by Tiffany Aliche (@TheBudgetnista). https://t.co/r5SgPEJmqo https://t.co/6GWB1BRh9T
我怎样才能积攒到能够支付新房的首付款？由Tiffany Aliche (@TheBudgetnista) 回答。https://t.co/r5SgPEJmqo https://t.co/6GWB1BRh9T
我怎樣才能積攢到能夠支付新房的首付款？由Tiffany Aliche (@TheBudgetnista) 回答。https://t.co/r5SgPEJmqo https://t.co/6GWB1BRh9T
